name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Clarif: I put quotes on Democratic not as mockery, but as a catch-all term for most "Western" governments that use some sort of voting system to elect officials, whether representative,  federalized, parliament-base d, or what not.

source_obj.text: Clarif: I put quotes on Democratic not as mockery, but as a catch-all term for most "Western" governments that use some sort of voting system to elect officials, whether representative,  federalized, parliament-base d, or what not.
